QuestData.Title: The Restless Earth
QuestData.Description: Until recently, a group of dwarves intruded on our lands to the west, carving the earth apart senselessly to search for treasure. When the very earth itself tore apart, the spirits of the land they had abused rose up and took their revenge.$B$BThe agitated earth spirits still roam the former dig site, $n. We must offer them appeasement.$B$BTake this drum with you to the west and play to the spirits. The rhythm may calm their fury and confusion.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Drums of the Soothed Earth to calm 6 Agitated Earth Spirits.
QuestData.RewardText: The land is clearly still in great upheaval if it took such effort to calm.$B$BRemember this, $n. Do not forget seeing the fate of those who would scar the Earth Mother.
